property.value: ■ Your evolution creatures cost 1 less to summon. property.name: Rules
property.value: {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Fire creatures. If it's a RexStars or fire creature, put that creature. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard. ■ While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power for each fire card in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, draw 3 cards then discard 2 cards from your hand. ■ 'Shinkapower': When this creature evolves, it can't be blocked until the start of your next turn and whenever your opponent would choose a creature, they can't choose this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature or when this creature's "EX Life" shield leaves your shield zone, destroy all your opponent's non-multicolored creatures. ■ Your opponent can't cast non-multicolored spells.

property.name: Rules

That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ When you reveal this creature to your opponent with the "Guard Strike" ability, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -3000 power until the end of the turn. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, each of your opponent's creatures gets -3000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, discard a card from your hand and draw 2 cards. Then you may put a creature from your hand that costs 7 or less that can evolve from this creature on top of this creature. ■ 'Shinkapower': When this creature evolves, untap each time it wins a battle this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, discard a card from your hand and draw 2 cards. property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. You may add an evolution creature from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard. ■ 'Shinkapower': When this creature evolves, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -1000 power for each card in your graveyard until the end of the turn.

(A creature that has "double breaker" breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {JUSTDIVER} (When you put this creature, it can't be chosen by your opponent and can't be attacked until the start of your next turn.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, draw 2 cards then put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Fire creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {POWERED BREAKER} (This creature breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.)} ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a RexStars or fire creature, put that creature. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard. ■ While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power for each fire card in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature or when this creature's "EX Life" shield leaves your shield zone, destroy all your opponent's non-multicolored creatures. ■ Your opponent can't cast non-multicolored spells.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, discard a card from your hand and draw 2 cards. Then you may put a creature from your hand that costs 7 or less that can evolve from this creature on top of this creature. ■ 'Shinkapower': When this creature evolves, untap each time it wins a battle this turn.

card.name: Still Justice Till The End <Kira Star>

property.name: Rules
property.value: {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Light creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, draw a card. Then you may put a creature from your hand that costs 4 or less. ■ Each of your creatures that cost 4 or less gets "blocker" and untaps at the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Water creatures. property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have 4 or more cards in your graveyard, this creature costs 3 less to summon. {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Darkness creatures. property.name: Rules

When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Each turn, you may untap this creature the first time it's tapped. ■ When this creature's "EX Life" shield leaves your shield zone, this creature can't leave the battle zone this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, you may cast a spell that costs 7 or less from your hand or graveyard for no cost. After you cast, put it on the bottom of your deck instead of your graveyard. ■ At the end of each of your turns, if you cast a spell that turn, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures that has power 5500 or less, destroy it, then draw a card.
